    Documentation Updates

    Below are recent documentation updates.

    Index of all documentation updates

    If you would like be sent an email whenever this page changes, please see the Setup Automatic Email on Documentation Updates document.

    22-December-2022

    New Docs

    Major updates

    • Title: Display Overlay Plugin
    • Description: Updated paths for new version (Player 7 compatible) - New Product Feature!
    • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/display-overlay-plugin.html
    • Product: Brightcove Player
    • Product Area: Plugins
    • Title: CMS/Playback APIs Search v1
    • Description: Clarified how to enter multiple search terms for fields
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/cms/searching/cmsplayback-api-videos-search.html#Quoted_search_terms
    • Product: Video Cloud
    • Product Area: Platform APIs

    Minor updates

    • Title: Configuring a Player Overlay Using the Overlay Plugin
    • Description: Modified code sample and added note to show how to add alt text for an overlay image
    • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/players/configuring-player-overlay-using-overlay-plugin.html
    • Product: Brightcove Player
    • Product Area: Overlay Plugin
    • Title: Brightcove Player 7 Migration Guide
    • Description: Created HTML table for plugin versions
    • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/references/bcp7-migration-guide.html#Plugins
    • Product: Brightcove Player
    • Product Area: Player 7

    9-December-2022

    New Docs

    Major updates

    • Title: Managing Slates
    • Description: Added notes clarifying that Cloud Playout slates are used only for Hard Starts and to fill live event time when there is no live input stream, and are not used to fill unused ad slot time (that is a different slate configured via Live SSAI setting.)
    • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/cloud-playout/managing-slates.html
    • Product: Video Cloud
    • Product Area: Cloud Playout

    Minor updates

    • Title: Managing Text Tracks Using the CMS API
    • Description: Added notes clarifying that the default flag is treated the same for remote and ingested text tracks and that only one file can be set as default per language
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/cms/managing-videos/managing-text-tracks.html
    • Product: Video Cloud
    • Product Area: CMS API
    • Title: Kollective eCDN Deployment Guide
    • Description: Added note on TTL expiration for videos and how it can be changed
    • Link: https://integrations.support.brightcove.com/ecdn/kollective/kollective-deployment-guide.html
    • Product: Video Cloud
    • Product Area: Integrations
    • Title: Brightcove Live: Best Practices
    • Description: Input restrictions updated
    • Link: https://live.support.brightcove.com/get-started/live-module-guidelines-and-best-practices.html
    • Product: Live
    • Product Area: Getting Started
